sentences.en: Americans, they like soft corn, and the Bantu, we like hard corn.

sentences.en: Before the arrival of the Europeans, the area was the home of Bantu - speaking peoples.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲人到达之前, 此地是操班图诸语言族人的家乡.

sentences.en: For more than 200 years, expeditions have set off into the jungles of the Congo River basin in search of the mythical Mobele-Mbembe — the "one who stops the flow of rivers, " in a local Bantu dialect.
sentences.cn: 早在两百年前起，就有探险队深入刚果河流域的森林，寻找着传说中神秘的刚果恐龙——在当地班图语里，刚果恐龙意为“截河断流的怪物”。

sentences.en: If I'd known I wouldn't have threatened you about that wretched Bantu girl.
sentences.cn: 假如我了解的话,就不会用那个可怜的班图女子要胁您了.

sentences.en: Populations of Bantu - language speakers who live in southern Africa today are far darker than the Khoisan.

sentences.en: To do so he looked at three well-studied parts of the linguistic family tree: the Bantu languages of Africa, the Indo-European group from Eurasia and the Austronesians of the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 为此，他考察了语言学族谱中的已经被彻底研究过的三个部分：非洲的班图语、欧亚大陆的印欧语系和太平洋上的南岛语族。
